'''Haleth''' was the oldest child of [[Helm|Helm Hammerhand]] and brother of [[Háma (son of Helm)|Háma]].
==History==
Haleth tried to defend [[Edoras]] from the [[Dunlendings]] who had invaded in {{TA|2758}}, but he was killed at the doors of [[Meduseld]], the last of its defenders. [[Wulf]] son of [[Freca]] usurped the throne while Helm and Háma fled to [[Helm's Deep]].<ref>{{App|Eorl}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Haleth'' means "man", "warrior" or "hero" in poetry in [[Old English]].<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. 704</ref><ref>{{webcite|website=[http://www.bosworthtoller.com/ Bosworth-Toller Anglo-Saxon Dictionary]|articleurl=https://bosworthtoller.com/17892|articlename=hæleþ|accessed=24 July 2025}}</ref> Not to be confused with [[Mannish]] [[Haleth]].
